title: Schools Are Closing Across Florida Ahead of Nicole
description: Some districts were closed as early as Wednesday, while others have canceled classes for the rest of the week.
dc:creator: Daniel Victor
media:credit: Joe Cavaretta/South Florida Sun-Sentinel, via Associated Press
media:description: People filling up sandbags at Mills Pond Park in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., on Tuesday, in preparation of Nicole.
